name: Roderick LEAR, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Lear v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Roderick LEAR, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of May, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
827 A.2d 373
Roderick LEAR, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 5, 2003.
